1247300.name: Population Zero Soundtrack
1247300.description: The atmospheric soundtrack sets the tone for the out-of-this-world adventure in a hostile yet incredibly alluring world of Kepler. Along with the distinctive art style, Population Zero's sweeping musical score will send your imagination through time and space to a remote constellation where human civilization might find a new home. Population Zero's soundtrack was composed, arranged and performed by Paweł Perepelica.
